summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1824, for the improvement of Loretta Place, in the City of Seattle, from Summit Avenue North to Bellevue Avenue North, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 19016, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
